content: It was reported but never confirmed he did a stint in the US Navy as a frogman and was credited with leading his team to mine Swordfish Cove in Florida and Halibut Bay in Mass. content: THIS JUST IN!!! Rescue personell having spent seventeen hours in extricating "Oscar" from his trash can have reported their failure to resusitate him. On Friday last it was reported to authorities that none of his aquaintences had seen him since the news of the death of Kermit, his beloved friend.....actually the only one who would talk to him.....well some times he would talk to him....not all the time just som....never mind!!! After sealing the lid of his.....residence, he was not heard from, there was no note.....well there may have been, but no-one is sure if it's a suicide note, or a threat!! Film at eleven........
